title: Jinlong Ru
text:
ViroProfiler: a containerized bioinformatics pipeline for viral metagenomic data analysis
TPD: a computational pipeline for therapeutic phage discovery from prophages

title: Jinlong Ru
text:
Database

TCMSP: a database of systems pharmacology for drug discovery from herbal medicines
DeepsmirUD_web: a database of predicted small molecule-mediated regulatory effects on miRNA expression

title: Jinlong Ru
text: Hi! My name is Jinlong Ru. I am a PhD researcher at Technische Universität München (TUM) and Helmholtz Zentrum München (HMGU). My research topic focuses on the role of bacteriophages and their effects on human health.

title: Jinlong Ru
text:
Education
Technical University of Munich • Germany | PhD in Bioinformatics | Oct 2015 -
Northwest A&F University • China | M.S in Bioinformatics | Sept 2012 - June 2015
Northwest A&F University • China | B.A in Biotechnology | Sept 2008 - June 2012
